title: Problem with games?
body:
Just wondering if there is a server problem atm. I was in an aram. As far as I could tell it counted down and started loading. But then it booted me back to the looking for game screen. It got to 6 mins 30 secs and I decided to exit out and try and relog in to LoL. Now it just keeps saying 
 "The login server did not respond. You may have a connection issue that is not related to the League of Legends server. See our current Service Status here: http://status.leagueoflegends.com

If you are still unable to connect, please check the following Knowledge Base article: support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/234161-Connection-Failure-Error-When-Logging-In

Still unable to connect? Contact Player Support at support.leagueoflegends.com"

I don't want to get banned if the game is actually in play. Please help RIOT

replies.body:
Hi folks

We're checking into it now.  Stand by!

Mindstar
is it a problem with certain isp providers?

It is a problem with the login servers, which we're working on getting back online at the moment.

There's no ETA just yet, but I'll make sure we post an update here when it is back online.

Cheers
Mindstar

Should be all back up and running now.  Let me know if anyone has any issues logging in.

Cheers!
Mindstar

> [{quoted}](name=Agent Mindstar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oEVn75Ew,comment-id=0013000000000003,timestamp=2017-01-07T22:55:20.666+0000)
>
> Should be all back up and running now.  Let me know if anyone has any issues logging in.
> 
> Cheers!
> Mindstar
